DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Immunogenicity Safety GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) Biologicals ' Herpes Zoster Subunit ( HZ/su ) Vaccine ( GSK1437173A ) When Co-administered With GSK Biologicals ' Diphtheria , Tetanus Pertussis Vaccine ( Boostrix® ) Adults Aged 50 Years Older
